name: Peter Previn's Space Adventure
description:
Listen to my album & shoot enemies & have fun.

Control the ship with the arrow keys, shoot with the spacebar.

Survive long enough and you'll enjoy all of the seven tracks.

The game was made following PUREHEART's Shmup tutorial on Youtube.

All sounds and music are mine and were implemented using FMOD.

All assets are from:

https://gamesupply.itch.io/mutant-spaceship
